text: Surfer, Dude is an 2008 comedy movie that was produced by Sidney Gus Gustawes, Mark Gustawes and Matthew McConaughey and was directed by S.R. Bindler. Surfer, Dude was released on September 5, 2008 in North America. The movie received strongly negative reviews with a 0% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 16 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == *Matthew McConaughey as Steve Addington *Alexie Gilmore as Danni Martin *Scott Glenn as Alister Greenbough *Jeffrey Nordling as Eddie Zarno *Nathan Phillips as Baker Smith *Willie Nelson as Farmer Bob *Woody Harrelson as Jack the Ripper *Zachary Knighton as Brillo Murphy *Ramón Rodríguez as Lupe La Rosa *John Terry as Mercer Martin *Sarah Wright as Stacey *Todd Stashwick as Vic Hayes == Other websites == *Surfer, Dude's Official website * Category:2008 movies Category:2008 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American independent movies
title: Surfer, Dude
